18#include <string>
19
20namespace ZXing {
21
22class BitMatrix;
23
24namespace OneD {
25
26/**
27* This object renders an EAN8 code as a {@link BitMatrix}.
28*
29* @author aripollak@gmail.com (Ari Pollak)
30*/
31class EAN8Writer
32{
33public:
34 EAN8Writer& setMargin(int sidesMargin) { _sidesMargin = sidesMargin; return *this; }
35 BitMatrix encode(const std::wstring& contents, int width, int height) const;
36
37private:
38 int _sidesMargin = -1;
39};
40
41} // OneD
42} // ZXing
